11 template<typename Scalar, typename Index, int NumDimensions>
12 Object::Type Celltree<Scalar, Index, NumDimensions>::type() {
13 
14  return (Object::Type)(Object::CELLTREE1 + NumDimensions - 1);
15 }

17 template<typename Scalar, typename Index, int NumDimensions>
18 V_COREEXPORT void Celltree<Scalar, Index, NumDimensions>::refreshImpl() const {
19 }
20 
21 template<typename Scalar, typename Index, int NumDimensions>
22 void Celltree<Scalar, Index, NumDimensions>::init(const Vector *min, const Vector *max,
23  const Vector &gmin, const Vector &gmax) {
24 
25  assert(nodes().size() == 1);
26  for (int i=0; i<NumDimensions; ++i)
27  this->min()[i] = gmin[i];
28  for (int i=0; i<NumDimensions; ++i)
29  this->max()[i] = gmax[i];
30 #ifdef CT_DEBUG
31  struct MinMaxBoundsFunctor: public Celltree::CellBoundsFunctor {
32  const Vector *m_min, *m_max;
33 
34  MinMaxBoundsFunctor(const Vector *min, const Vector *max)
35  : m_min(min)
36  , m_max(max)
37  {}
38 
39  bool operator()(Index elem, Vector *min, Vector *max) const {
40 
41  auto vmin = m_min[elem], vmax = m_max[elem];
42  *min = vmin;
43  *max = vmax;
44 
45  return true;
46  }
47  };
48  MinMaxBoundsFunctor boundFunc(min, max);
49  this->validateTree(boundFunc);
50 #endif
51  refine(min, max, 0, gmin, gmax);
52 #ifdef CT_DEBUG
53  std::cerr << "created celltree: " << nodes().size() << " nodes, " << cells().size() << " cells" << std::endl;
54  validateTree(boundFunc);
55 #endif
56 }
57 
58 template<typename Scalar, typename Index, int NumDimensions>
59 void Celltree<Scalar, Index, NumDimensions>::refine(const Vector *min, const Vector *max, Index curNode,
60  const Vector &gmin, const Vector &gmax) {
61 
62  const Scalar smax = std::numeric_limits<Scalar>::max();
63 
64  const int NumBuckets = 5;
65 
66  Node *node = &(nodes()[curNode]);
67 
68  // only split node if necessary
69  if (node->size <= 8)
70  return;
71 
72  // cell index array, contains runs of cells belonging to nodes
73  Index *cells = d()->m_cells->data();
74 
75  // sort cells into buckets for each possible split dimension
76 
77  // initialize min/max extents of buckets
78  Index bucket[NumDimensions][NumBuckets];
79  Vector bmin[NumBuckets], bmax[NumBuckets];
80  for (int i=0; i<NumBuckets; ++i) {
81  for (int d=0; d<NumDimensions; ++d)
82  bucket[d][i] = 0;
83  bmin[i].fill(smax);
84  bmax[i].fill(-smax);
85  }
86 
87  auto center = [min, max](Index c) -> Vector { return Scalar(0.5)*(min[c]+max[c]); };
88 
89  // find min/max extents of cell centers
90  Vector cmin, cmax;
91  cmin.fill(smax);
92  cmax.fill(-smax);
93  for (Index i=node->start; i<node->start+node->size; ++i) {
94  const Index cell = cells[i];
95  Vector cent = center(cell);
96  for (int d=0; d<NumDimensions; ++d) {
97  if (cmin[d] > cent[d])
98  cmin[d] = cent[d];
99  if (cmax[d] < cent[d])
100  cmax[d] = cent[d];
101  }
102  }
103 
104  // sort cells into buckets
105  const Vector crange = cmax - cmin;
106 
107  auto getBucket = [cmin, cmax, crange, NumBuckets] (Vector center, int d) -> int { return crange[d] == 0 ? 0 : std::min(int((center[d] - cmin[d])/crange[d] * NumBuckets), NumBuckets -1); };
108 
109  for (Index i=node->start; i<node->start+node->size; ++i) {
110  const Index cell = cells[i];
111  const Vector cent = center(cell);
112  for (int d=0; d<NumDimensions; ++d) {
113  const int b = getBucket(cent, d);
114  assert(b >= 0);
115  assert(b < NumBuckets);
116  ++bucket[d][b];
117  bmin[b][d] = std::min(bmin[b][d], min[cell][d]);
118  bmax[b][d] = std::max(bmax[b][d], max[cell][d]);
119  }
120  }
121 
122  // adjust bucket bounds for empty buckets
123  for (int d=0; d<NumDimensions; ++d) {
124  for (int b=NumBuckets-2; b>=0; --b) {
125  if (bmin[b][d] > bmin[b+1][d])
126  bmin[b][d] = bmin[b+1][d];
127  }
128  for (int b=1; b<NumBuckets; ++b) {
129  if (bmax[b][d] < bmax[b-1][d])
130  bmax[b][d] = bmax[b-1][d];
131  }
132  }
133 
134  // find best split dimension and plane
135  Scalar min_weight(smax);
136  int best_dim=-1, best_bucket=-1;
137  for (int d=0; d<NumDimensions; ++d) {
138  Index nleft = 0;
139  for (int split_b=0; split_b<NumBuckets-1; ++split_b) {
140  nleft += bucket[d][split_b];
141  assert(node->size >= nleft);
142  const Index nright = node->size - nleft;
143  Scalar weight = nleft * (bmax[split_b][d]-bmin[0][d])
144  + nright * (bmax[NumBuckets-1][d]-bmin[split_b+1][d]);
145  if (crange[d] > 0)
146  weight /= node->size * crange[d];
147  else
148  weight = smax;
149  //std::cerr << "d="<<d<< ", b=" << split_b<< ", weight=" << weight << std::endl;
150  if (nleft>0 && nright>0 && weight < min_weight) {
151  min_weight = weight;
152  best_dim = d;
153  best_bucket = split_b;
154  }
155  }
156  assert(nleft+bucket[d][NumBuckets-1] == node->size);
157  }
158  if (best_dim == -1) {
159  std::cerr << "abandoning split with " << node->size << " children" << std::endl;
160  return;
161  }
162 
163  // split index lists...
164  const Index size = node->size;
165  const Index start = node->start;
166 
167  // record children into node being split
168  const Scalar Lmax = bmax[best_bucket][best_dim];
169  const Scalar Rmin = bmin[best_bucket+1][best_dim];
170  *node = Node(best_dim, Lmax, Rmin, nodes().size());
171  const Index D = best_dim;
172 
173  auto centerD = [min, max, D](Index c) -> Scalar { return Scalar(0.5)*(min[c][D]+max[c][D]); };
174  auto getBucketD = [cmin, cmax, crange, D, NumBuckets] (Scalar center) -> int { return crange[D] == 0 ? 0 : std::min(int((center - cmin[D])/crange[D] * NumBuckets), NumBuckets -1); };
175 
176 #ifdef CT_DEBUG
177  const Scalar split = cmin[D] + crange[D] / NumBuckets * (best_bucket+1);
178 #ifdef CT_DEBUG_VERBOSE
179  std::cerr << "split: dim=" << best_dim << ", bucket=" << best_bucket;
180  std::cerr << " (";
181  for (int i=0; i<NumBuckets; ++i) {
182  std::cerr << bucket[best_dim][i];
183  if (i == best_bucket)
184  std::cerr << "|";
185  else if (i<NumBuckets-1)
186  std::cerr << " ";
187  }
188  std::cerr << ")";
189  std::cerr << " split: " << split;
190  std::cerr << " (" << cmin[D] << " - " << cmax[D] << ")";
191  std::cerr << std::endl;
192 #endif
193 #endif
194 
195  Index nleft = 0;
196  Index *top = &cells[start+size];
197  for (Index *c = &cells[start]; c < top; ++c) {
198  const Scalar cent = centerD(*c);
199  const int b = getBucketD(cent);
200  if (b > best_bucket) {
201  for (Scalar other; ; ) {
202  --top;
203  other = centerD(*top);
204  const int bo = getBucketD(other);
205  if (bo < best_bucket+1) {
206  if (c < top) {
207  std::swap(*c, *top);
208  ++nleft;
209  }
210  break;
211  }
212  }
213  } else {
214  ++nleft;
215  }
216  }
217 
218 #ifdef CT_DEBUG
219  for (Index i=nleft; i<size; ++i) {
220  Index c = cells[start+i];
221  Vector cent = center(c);
222  assert(cent[D] >= split);
223  assert(min[c][D] >= Rmin);
224  for (int i=0; i<3; ++i) {
225  assert(min[c][i] >= gmin[i]);
226  assert(max[c][i] <= gmax[i]);
227  }
228  }
229  for (Index i=0; i<nleft; ++i) {
230  Index c = cells[start+i];
231  Vector cent = center(c);
232  assert(cent[D] <= split);
233  assert(max[c][D] <= Lmax);
234  for (int i=0; i<3; ++i) {
235  assert(min[c][i] >= gmin[i]);
236  assert(max[c][i] <= gmax[i]);
237  }
238  }
239 #endif
240 
241  Index l = nodes().size();
242  nodes().push_back(Node(start, nleft));
243 
244  Index r = nodes().size();
245  nodes().push_back(Node(start+nleft, size-nleft));
246 
247  assert(nodes()[l].size < size);
248  assert(nodes()[r].size < size);
249  assert(nodes()[l].size + nodes()[r].size == size);
250 
251  Vector nmin = gmin;
252  Vector nmax = gmax;
253 
254  // further refinement for left...
255  nmin[best_dim] = bmin[0][best_dim];
256  nmax[best_dim] = bmax[best_bucket][best_dim];
257  refine(min, max, l, nmin, nmax);
258 
259  // ...and right subnodes
260  nmin[best_dim] = bmin[best_bucket+1][best_dim];
261  nmax[best_dim] = bmax[NumBuckets-1][best_dim];
262  refine(min, max, r, nmin, nmax);
263 }
264 
265 template<typename Scalar, typename Index, int NumDimensions>
266 template<class BoundsFunctor>
267 bool Celltree<Scalar, Index, NumDimensions>::validateTree(BoundsFunctor &boundFunc) const {
268 
269  Vector mmin, mmax;
270  for (int c=0; c<NumDimensions; ++c) {
271  mmin[c] = min()[c];
272  mmax[c] = max()[c];
273  }
274 #ifdef CT_DEBUG
275  std::cerr << "validateCelltree: min=" << mmin << ", max=" << mmax << std::endl;
276 #endif
277  return validateNode(boundFunc, 0, mmin, mmax);
278 }
279 
280 template<typename Scalar, typename Index, int NumDimensions>
281 template<class BoundsFunctor>
282 bool Celltree<Scalar, Index, NumDimensions>::validateNode(BoundsFunctor &boundFunc, Index nodenum, const Vector &min, const Vector &max) const {
283 
284  bool valid = true;
285  const Index *cells = d()->m_cells->data();
286  const Node *node = &(nodes()[nodenum]);
287  if (node->isLeaf()) {
288  for (Index i=node->start; i<node->start+node->size; ++i) {
289  const Index elem = cells[i];
290  Vector emin, emax;
291  boundFunc(elem, &emin, &emax);
292  for (int d=0; d<NumDimensions; ++d) {
293  if (emin[d] < min[d]) {
294  std::cerr << "celltree node " << nodenum << " @" << i-node->start << " of " << node->size << ": min[" << d << "] violation on elem " << elem << ": is " << emin << ", should " << min << std::endl;
295  valid = false;
296  }
297  if (emax[d] > max[d]) {
298  std::cerr << "celltree node " << nodenum << " @" << i-node->start << " of " << node->size << ": max[" << d << "] violation on elem " << elem << ": is " << emax << ", should " << max << std::endl;
299  valid = false;
300  }
301  }
302  }
303  return valid;
304  }
305 
306  if (node->Lmax < min[node->dim]) {
307  std::cerr << "celltree: Lmax=" << node->Lmax << " too small for dim=" << node->dim << ", should >= " << min[node->dim] << std::endl;
308  valid = false;
309  }
310  if (node->Rmin < min[node->dim]) {
311  std::cerr << "celltree: Rmin=" << node->Rmin << " too small for dim=" << node->dim << ", should >= " << min[node->dim] << std::endl;
312  valid = false;
313  }
314  if (node->Lmax > max[node->dim]) {
315  std::cerr << "celltree: Lmax=" << node->Lmax << " too large for dim=" << node->dim << ", should <= " << max[node->dim] << std::endl;
316  valid = false;
317  }
318  if (node->Rmin > max[node->dim]) {
319  std::cerr << "celltree: Rmin=" << node->Rmin << " too large for dim=" << node->dim << ", should <= " << max[node->dim] << std::endl;
320  valid = false;
321  }
322 
323  Vector lmax(max), rmin(min);
324  lmax[node->dim] = node->Lmax;
325  rmin[node->dim] = node->Rmin;
326 
327  if (!validateNode(boundFunc, node->left(), min, lmax))
328  valid = false;
329  if (!validateNode(boundFunc, node->right(), rmin, max))
330  valid = false;
331  return valid;
332 }

334 template <class Scalar, class Index, int NumDimensions>
335 template <class Archive>
336 void Celltree<Scalar, Index, NumDimensions>::Data::serialize(Archive &ar) {
337 
338  assert("serialization of Celltree::Node not implemented" == 0);
339 }

341 template<typename Scalar, typename Index, int NumDimensions>
342 Celltree<Scalar, Index, NumDimensions>::Celltree(const Index numCells,
343  const Meta &meta)
344 : Celltree::Base(Celltree::Data::create("", numCells, meta))
345 {
346  refreshImpl();
347 }

349 template<typename Scalar, typename Index, int NumDimensions>
350 Celltree<Scalar, Index, NumDimensions>::Celltree()
351 : Celltree::Base()
352 {
353  refreshImpl();
354 }

356 template<typename Scalar, typename Index, int NumDimensions>
357 Celltree<Scalar, Index, NumDimensions>::Celltree(Data *data)
358 : Celltree::Base(data)

361 }
362 
363 template<typename Scalar, typename Index, int NumDimensions>
364 bool Celltree<Scalar, Index, NumDimensions>::isEmpty() const {
365 
366  return d()->m_nodes->empty() || d()->m_cells->empty();
367 }
368 
369 template<typename Scalar, typename Index, int NumDimensions>
370 bool Celltree<Scalar, Index, NumDimensions>::checkImpl() const {
371 
372  V_CHECK(d()->m_nodes->size() >= 1);
373  V_CHECK(d()->m_nodes->size() <= d()->m_cells->size());
374  if ((*d()->m_nodes)[0].isLeaf()) {
375  V_CHECK((*d()->m_nodes)[0].size <= d()->m_cells->size());
376  } else {
377  V_CHECK((*d()->m_nodes)[0].Lmax >= (*d()->m_nodes)[0].Rmin);
378  }
379  return true;
380 }
381 
382 template<typename Scalar, typename Index, int NumDimensions>
383 void Celltree<Scalar, Index, NumDimensions>::Data::initData() {
384 
385  const Scalar smax = std::numeric_limits<Scalar>::max();
386  for(int d=0; d<NumDimensions; ++d) {
387  m_bounds[d] = smax;
388  m_bounds[NumDimensions+d] = -smax;
389  }
390 
391  m_nodes.construct(1);
392  (*m_nodes)[0] = Node(0, 0);
393 }
394 
395 template<typename Scalar, typename Index, int NumDimensions>
396 Celltree<Scalar, Index, NumDimensions>::Data::Data(const Data &o, const std::string &n)
397 : Celltree::Base::Data(o, n)
398 , m_cells(o.m_cells)
399 , m_nodes(o.m_nodes)
400 {
401  memcpy(m_bounds, o.m_bounds, sizeof(m_bounds));
402 }
403 
404 template<typename Scalar, typename Index, int NumDimensions>
405 Celltree<Scalar, Index, NumDimensions>::Data::Data(const std::string &name, const Index numCells,
406  const Meta &meta)
407 : Base::Data(Object::Type(Object::CELLTREE1-1+NumDimensions), name, meta)
408 {
409  initData();
410 
411  m_cells.construct(numCells);
412 
413  Index *cells = m_cells->data();
414  for (Index i=0; i<numCells; ++i) {
415  cells[i] = i;
416  }
417 
418  (*m_nodes)[0] = Node(0, numCells);
419 }
420 
421 template<typename Scalar, typename Index, int NumDimensions>
422 typename Celltree<Scalar, Index, NumDimensions>::Data *Celltree<Scalar, Index, NumDimensions>::Data::create(const std::string &objId, const Index numCells,
423  const Meta &meta) {
424 
425  const std::string name = Shm::the().createObjectId(objId);
426  Data *ct = shm<Data>::construct(name)(name, numCells, meta);
427  publish(ct);
428 
429  return ct;
430 }

443 typename Celltree<Scalar, Index, NumDimensions>::Data *Celltree<Scalar, Index, NumDimensions>::Data::createNamed(Object::Type id, const std::string &name) {

446  return t;
